fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.reflection

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.tools.reflection.Reflection

  • public final class Reflection
extends Object
    A set of tools to simplify reflective operations on Bukkit and the Native Minecraft Server.
    Author:
    ProkopyL, Amaury Carrade

      • getBukkitClassByName

        public static Class<?> getBukkitClassByName(String name)
                                     throws ClassNotFoundException
        Returns the Class of a Bukkit class from it's name (without the main Bukkit package).

        For example, with "Server", this method returns the org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_X_RX.Server class.

        Parameters:
        name - The Bukkit's class name (without the main Bukkit package).
        Returns:
        The class.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if no class exists with this name in the Bukkit package.

      • getMinecraftClassByName

        public static Class getMinecraftClassByName(String name)
                                     throws ClassNotFoundException
        Returns the Class of a NMS class from it's name (without the main NMS package).

        For example, with "Server", this method returns the net.minecraft.server.v1_X_RX.Server class.

        Parameters:
        name - The NMS' class name (without the main Bukkit package).
        Returns:
        The class.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if no class exists with this name in the NMS package.

      • getFieldValue

        public static Object getFieldValue(Class<?> klass,
                                   Object instance,
                                   String name)
                            throws NoSuchFieldException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException,
                                   IllegalAccessException
        Returns the value of a field (regardless of its visibility) for the given instance.
        Parameters:
        klass - The instance's class.
        instance - The instance.
        name - The field's name.
        Returns:
        The field's value for the given instance.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if the field does not exists.
        IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an instance of klass.
        IllegalAccessException - if the field cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.

      • getFieldValue

        public static Object getFieldValue(Object instance,
                                   String name)
                            throws NoSuchFieldException,
                                   IllegalArgumentException,
                                   IllegalAccessException
        Returns the value of a field (regardless of its visibility) for the given instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The instance.
        name - The field's name.
        Returns:
        The field's value for the given instance.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if the field does not exists.
        IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an instance of itself (should never happens).
        IllegalAccessException - if the field cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.

        The Field.
        Throws:

                             Class<?> type)

        Parameters:
        klass - The field's parent class.
        type - The field's class.
        Returns:
        The Field.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if the class does not contains any field with this name.

        Update the field with the given name in the given instance using the given value.

        name - The name of the field to be updated.
        value - The new value of the field.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if no field with the given name was found.
        IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an instance of itself (should never happens).
        IllegalAccessException - if the field cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.

      • call

        public static Object call(Class<?> klass,
                          String name,
                          Object... parameters)
                   throws NoSuchMethodException,
                          IllegalAccessException,
                          IllegalArgumentException,
                          InvocationTargetException
        Calls the given static method of the given class, passing the given parameters to it.
        Parameters:
        klass - The method's parent class.
        name - The method's name.
        parameters - The parameters to be passed to the method.
        Returns:
        the object the called method returned.
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException - if no method with this name is defined in the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the method cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the method is an instance method; if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion.
        InvocationTargetException - if an exception is thrown by the called method.

      • call

        public static Object call(Object instance,
                          String name,
                          Object... parameters)
                   throws NoSuchMethodException,
                          IllegalAccessException,
                          IllegalArgumentException,
                          InvocationTargetException
        Calls the given method on the given instance, passing the given parameters to it.
        Parameters:
        instance - The object the method is invoked from.
        name - The method's name.
        parameters - The parameters to be passed to the method.
        Returns:
        the object the called method returned.
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException - if no method with this name is defined in the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the method cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the method is an instance method and the specified object argument is not an instance of the class or interface declaring the underlying method (or of a subclass or implementor thereof); if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion.
        InvocationTargetException - if an exception is thrown by the called method.

      • call

        public static Object call(Class<?> klass,
                          Object instance,
                          String name,
                          Object... parameters)
                   throws NoSuchMethodException,
                          IllegalAccessException,
                          IllegalArgumentException,
                          InvocationTargetException
        Calls the given method on the given instance, passing the given parameters to it.
        Parameters:
        klass - The method's parent class.
        instance - The object the method is invoked from.
        name - The method's name.
        parameters - The parameters to be passed to the method.
        Returns:
        the object the called method returned.
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException - if no method with this name is defined in the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the method cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the method is an instance method and the specified object argument is not an instance of the class or interface declaring the underlying method (or of a subclass or implementor thereof); if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion.
        InvocationTargetException - if an exception is thrown by the called method.

        Parameters:
        klass - The class.
        name - The name of the method to look for
        parameterTypes - The parameter types to look for
        Returns:
        If the method exists in the given class, or not

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(Class<T> klass,
                                Object... parameters)
                         throws NoSuchMethodException,
                                InstantiationException,
                                IllegalAccessException,
                                IllegalArgumentException,
                                InvocationTargetException
        Creates and returns an instance of the given class, passing the given parameters to the appropriate constructor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to be instanciated.
        Parameters:
        klass - The class to be instantiated.
        parameters - The parameters to be passed to the constructor. This also determines which constructor will be called.
        Returns:
        the created instance.
        Throws:
        NoSuchMethodException - if no constructor with these parameters types exists.
        InstantiationException - if the class cannot be instantiated, due to a non-accessible or non-existent constructor, the class being an abstract one or an interface, a primitive type, or void.
        IllegalAccessException - if the constructor cannot be accessed due to a Java language access control.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number of actual and formal parameters differ; if an unwrapping conversion for primitive arguments fails; or if, after possible unwrapping, a parameter value cannot be converted to the corresponding formal parameter type by a method invocation conversion; if this constructor pertains to an enum type.
        InvocationTargetException - if an exception is thrown in the constructor.

      • findConstructor

        public static <T> Constructor<?> findConstructor(Class<T> klass,
                                                 int parameterCount)
        Finds a matching constructor.

      • getTypes

        public static Class[] getTypes(Object[] objects)
        Returns an array of the same size of the given array, containing the types of the objects in the given array, in the same order.
        Parameters:
        objects - The original array.
        Returns:
        an array with the types of the items in the original array.

      • getCallerClass

        public static Class<?> getCallerClass()
        Returns the first class in the call hierarchy that have a defined name (i.e. the first non-anonymous caller class), excluding the very first one.

        In other words, return the named class that called the method this method is called from.

        Returns:
        The caller class.

      • getCallerClass

        public static <T> Class<? extends T> getCallerClass(Class<T> baseType)
        Returns the first class in the call stack with the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The looked-up type.
        Parameters:
        baseType - The type to lookup for.
        Returns:
        The caller class of the specified type, or null if none found.

      • getDeclaringClass

        public static <T> Class<T> getDeclaringClass(T value)
        Returns the class of the value, or the declaring class if value is an enum.

      • getClosestType

        public static Class<?> getClosestType(Class<?> reference,
                                      Collection<Class<?>> candidates)
        Finds the type that is "closest" to the given type in the candidate list.
